languages.text: {n}Сухой голос Иеронимуса бьет по ушам, словно щелчок кнута.{/n} "Смирите гордыню оба. Я не желаю сражаться с тобой, Каллигос, но и угроз твоих не страшусь. Смерть не пугает меня, ведь она — неизбежна. Это так же истинно, как и то, что война меж нами лишена смысла и цели".

traits.locale_text: {n}Сухой голос Иеронимуса бьет по ушам, словно щелчок кнута.{/n} "Смирите гордыню оба. Я не желаю сражаться с тобой, Каллигос, но и угроз твоих не страшусь. Смерть не пугает меня, ведь она — неизбежна. Это так же истинно, как и то, что война меж нами лишена смысла и цели".

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus's dry voice hits your ears like the crack of a whip.{/n} "Quell your pride, both of you. I do not wish to fight you, Calligos, but I fear not your threats. Death does not frighten me, for it is inevitable. It is as true as the senselessness and pointlessness of a war between us."
languages.original_text: {n}Сухой голос Иеронимуса бьет по ушам, словно щелчок кнута.{/n} "Смирите гордыню оба. Я не желаю сражаться с тобой, Каллигос, но и угроз твоих не страшусь. Смерть не пугает меня, ведь она — неизбежна. Это так же истинно, как и то, что война меж нами лишена смысла и цели".

Death does not frighten me, for it is inevitable. It is as true as the senselessness and pointlessness of a war between us."

{n}Hieronymus's dry voice hits your ears like the crack of a whip.{/n} "Quell your pride, both of you. I do not wish to fight you, Calligos, but I fear not your threats. Death does not frighten me, for it is inevitable. It is as true as the senselessness and pointlessness of a war between us."

{n}Hieronymus's dry voice hits your ears like the crack of a whip.{/n} "Quell your pride, both of you. I do not wish to fight you, Calligos, but I fear not your threats. Death does not frighten me, for it is inevitable. It is as true as the senselessness and pointlessness of a war between us."

languages.text: {n}ヒエロニムスのむち打つような鋭い声があなたの耳を打つ。{/n}「両者、プライドを納めなさい。あなた方が戦うのは望ましくありません。ですがカリゴス、私はそんな脅しを恐れていません。死は恐怖の対象になりません、避けられないものなのですから。それが真実です、我々の間で争うことは無意味かつ不適切であるのと同様に」
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus's dry voice hits your ears like the crack of a whip.{/n} "Quell your pride, both of you. I do not wish to fight you, Calligos, but I fear not your threats. Death does not frighten me, for it is inevitable. It is as true as the senselessness and pointlessness of a war between us."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヒエロニムスのむち打つような鋭い声があなたの耳を打つ。{/n}「両者、プライドを納めなさい。あなた方が戦うのは望ましくありません。ですがカリゴス、私はそんな脅しを恐れていません。死は恐怖の対象になりません、避けられないものなのですから。それが真実です、我々の間で争うことは無意味かつ不適切であるのと同様に」

languages.text: {n}希罗尼穆斯干巴巴的声音如同鞭子噼啪作响，传到了所有人的耳中。{/n}“两位，收起你们的自负吧。卡里戈斯，我不想与你开战，但我也并不惧怕你的恐吓。我不害怕死亡，因为人终有一死。我们之间的战斗毫无意义，也毫无目的，这是不争的事实——就像死亡一样。”
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus's dry voice hits your ears like the crack of a whip.{/n} "Quell your pride, both of you. I do not wish to fight you, Calligos, but I fear not your threats. Death does not frighten me, for it is inevitable. It is as true as the senselessness and pointlessness of a war between us."

traits.locale_text: {n}希罗尼穆斯干巴巴的声音如同鞭子噼啪作响，传到了所有人的耳中。{/n}“两位，收起你们的自负吧。卡里戈斯，我不想与你开战，但我也并不惧怕你的恐吓。我不害怕死亡，因为人终有一死。我们之间的战斗毫无意义，也毫无目的，这是不争的事实——就像死亡一样。”

languages.text: {n}La voz seca de Hieronymus azota tus oídos como un latigazo.{/n} «Contengan su orgullo. Calligos, no quiero enfrentarme a usted, pero no temo sus amenazas. La muerte no me asusta, es algo inevitable. Es algo tan seguro como la futilidad y la insensatez de una guerra entre los presentes».
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus's dry voice hits your ears like the crack of a whip.{/n} "Quell your pride, both of you. I do not wish to fight you, Calligos, but I fear not your threats. Death does not frighten me, for it is inevitable. It is as true as the senselessness and pointlessness of a war between us."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz seca de Hieronymus azota tus oídos como un latigazo.{/n} «Contengan su orgullo. Calligos, no quiero enfrentarme a usted, pero no temo sus amenazas. La muerte no me asusta, es algo inevitable. Es algo tan seguro como la futilidad y la insensatez de una guerra entre los presentes».

languages.text: {n}La voix sèche de Hiéronymus claque comme un fouet à vos oreilles.{/n} « Cessez de faire les coqs, tous les deux. Je n'ai aucun désir de vous affronter, Calligos, mais sachez que vos menaces ne m'effraient en rien. Je n'ai pas peur de la mort, car elle est inéluctable. Elle est aussi tangible que l'absurdité d'une guerre entre nous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus's dry voice hits your ears like the crack of a whip.{/n} "Quell your pride, both of you. I do not wish to fight you, Calligos, but I fear not your threats. Death does not frighten me, for it is inevitable. It is as true as the senselessness and pointlessness of a war between us."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix sèche d'Hiéronymus claque comme un fouet à vos oreilles.{/n} « Cessez de faire les coqs, tous les deux. Je n'ai aucun désir de vous affronter, Calligos, mais sachez que vos menaces ne m'effraient en rien. Je n'ai pas peur de la mort, car elle est inéluctable. Elle est aussi tangible que l'absurdité d'une guerre entre nous. »

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus' nüchterne Stimme trifft deine Ohren wie ein Peitschenknall.{/n} "Bremst Euren Stolz, alle beide. Ich will nicht gegen Euch kämpfen, Calligos, aber ich fürchte auch Eure Drohungen nicht. Der Tod schreckt mich nicht, denn er ist unvermeidbar. Und das ist ebenso wahr wie die Sinn- und Nutzlosigkeit eines Krieges zwischen uns."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus's dry voice hits your ears like the crack of a whip.{/n} "Quell your pride, both of you. I do not wish to fight you, Calligos, but I fear not your threats. Death does not frighten me, for it is inevitable. It is as true as the senselessness and pointlessness of a war between us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus' nüchterne Stimme trifft deine Ohren wie ein Peitschenknall.{/n} "Bremst Euren Stolz, alle beide. Ich will nicht gegen Euch kämpfen, Calligos, aber ich fürchte auch Eure Drohungen nicht. Der Tod schreckt mich nicht, denn er ist unvermeidbar. Und das ist ebenso wahr wie die Sinn- und Nutzlosigkeit eines Krieges zwischen uns."

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus'un kuru sesi, kulaklarına kırbaç şaklaması gibi çarpıyor.{/n} "Gururunuz batsın ikinizin de. Seninle dövüşmek istemiyorum Calligos ama tehditlerinden de korkmuyorum. Ölüm beni korkutmaz zira kaçınılmazdır. Bu söylediğim, aramızda yaşanacak savaşın anlamsızlığı ve manasızlığı kadar gerçek."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus's dry voice hits your ears like the crack of a whip.{/n} "Quell your pride, both of you. I do not wish to fight you, Calligos, but I fear not your threats. Death does not frighten me, for it is inevitable. It is as true as the senselessness and pointlessness of a war between us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus'un kuru sesi kulaklarına kırbaç sesi gibi çarpıyor.{/n} "Gururunuz batsın ikinizin de. Seninle dövüşmek istemiyorum Calligos ama tehditlerinden de korkmuyorum. Ölüm beni korkutmaz çünkü kaçınılmazdır. Aramızda yaşanacak savaşın anlamsızlığı ve manasızlığı kadar gerçek bu söylediğim."
